channel.title: Multimodal Generation on HF Daily Paper Reviews by AI
channel.description: Recent content in Multimodal Generation on HF Daily Paper Reviews by AI

item.title: VideoUFO: A Million-Scale User-Focused Dataset for Text-to-Video Generation
item.description: VideoUFO: A new user-focused, million-scale dataset that improves text-to-video generation by aligning training data with real user interests and preferences!

item.title: Taming Multimodal Joint Training for High-Quality Video-to-Audio Synthesis
item.description: MMAudio achieves state-of-the-art video-to-audio synthesis by jointly training on audio-visual and text-audio data, enabling high-quality, semantically and temporally aligned audio generation.

item.title: Multimodal Music Generation with Explicit Bridges and Retrieval Augmentation
item.description: VMB generates music from videos, images, and text, using description and retrieval bridges to improve quality and controllability.

item.title: Multimodal Latent Language Modeling with Next-Token Diffusion
item.description: LatentLM: a novel multimodal model unifying discrete & continuous data via next-token diffusion, surpassing existing methods in performance & scalability across various tasks.

item.title: OmniFlow: Any-to-Any Generation with Multi-Modal Rectified Flows
item.description: OmniFlow: a novel generative model masters any-to-any multi-modal generation, outperforming existing models and offering flexible control!

item.title: SmoothCache: A Universal Inference Acceleration Technique for Diffusion Transformers
item.description: SmoothCache: A universal technique boosts Diffusion Transformer inference speed by 8-71% across modalities, without sacrificing quality!
